name: spark
description:
Apache Spark is a fast and general engine for large-scale data
processing.

dependencies.name: java
dependencies.description:
The Java Development Kit (JDK) released by Oracle Corporation in the
form of a binary product aimed at Java developers. Includes a complete
JRE plus tools for developing, debugging, and monitoring Java
applications.

dependencies.name: hadoop
dependencies.description:
The Apache Hadoop software library is a framework that allows for the
distributed processing of large data sets across clusters of computers
using simple programming models.

dependent_to.name: grnboost
dependent_to.description:
GRNBoost is a library built on top of Apache Spark that implements a
scalable strategy for gene regulatory network (GRN) inference. See
https://github.com/aertslab/GRNBoost/blob/master/docs/user_guide.md for
the user guide. The location of xgboost4j-<version>.jar and GRNBoost.jar
are set to $XGBOOST_JAR and $GRNBOOST_JAR. Path to
xgboost4j-<version>.jar is also added to CLASSPATH.
